DataElement.preferredDefinition: A sponsor-defined identifier used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record unique group identifier. Sponsor may insert additional instructions to ensure each record has a unique group identifier.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SCGRPID
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: It can be beneficial to use an identifier in a data query to communicate clearly to the site the specific record in question. This group identifier ties together all the tests collected on this horizontal record. This field may be populated by the sponsor's data collection system.
